title: Relates to sex offenses facilitated by the use of controlled substances and "date rape drugs"
summary: Requires testing of a sexual assault victim for the presence of "date rape drugs"; creates a first degree offense for facilitating a sex offense with controlled substances considered to be "date rape drugs"; and creates a second degree offense for facilitating a sex offense with controlled substances other than "date rape drugs".
